name: Getting Under It
description:
Get under it is a game inspired by Getting over it 

but with a little twist:
You have to climb up the crazy mountain, but....
is that even possible?
If you fall down, the ground will break and you can climb new sections!

This Game was made during three days for
the Woowie Game Jam 2021.

Controls
You can only control the pickaxe, with the mouse.
